title: How to Play Rampage: Total Destruction

steps.headline: Start destroying the cities!
steps.description: You start at Las Vegas. Follow the instructions that come up.

steps.headline: After you are finished destroying all the roads in a certain city, you will have to fight a boss.
Beat up the boss to finish the city.
Continue this method for all cities.

text: Start the game.  Start Campaign Mode.  Start destroying the cities! You start at Las Vegas. Follow the instructions that come up. After you are finished destroying all the roads in a certain city, you will have to fight a boss.  Beat up the boss to finish the city.  Continue this method for all cities.
